name: Mikel-Jon West
description: Home site of Mikel-Jon (Mike) West, Video Editor, Writer, Director, Visual Designer, and Technician.

projects.title: Mega Ultra Studios
projects.description: Mega Ultra Studios creates short and feature films, music videos, and promotional packages for independent artists and small buinesses
projects.longDescription: I like working for major motion picture studios and broadcast networks, but I aldo like doing my own thing. I created Mega Ultra Studios to create feaure films, short film and 48 Hour Film projects, music videos, and promotional packages for performing artists. I plan shoots, handle storyboards, write scripts, design titles and promotional material, and create packages for social media. I hire and work with poducers, cast, and crew when needed.

projects.title: My Second Project
projects.description: This is a description of my second project.
projects.longDescription: This is a longer description of my second project that provides more detail about the project and its features.
